to regenerative rice, also known as regenerative rice.
This is a type of rice that blooms from the stubble
after farmers harvest the main rice crop.
This type of rice grows naturally without needing
care or fertilization.  Therefore, the yield is
not high. In return, the rice produces
clean and delicious Candy Seeds. However,

flooded rice fields. Faced with

created a rice threshing machine that
can be used even in flooded fields
since the rice harvester that

Hundreds of dog farm owners in
Korea held a protest near the

January 30.  11 Some people had previously

this area to protest the government's passing of the
law prohibiting the sale and destruction of
wind towns. However, the action was stopped by the police, and
more than 200 farmers were stopped.  Fighting with
the police when they tried to break through the fence to get to the
President's office
means taking away the right to food of individuals
is a crime and brutality. We will

and ensure food safety.  The existence of the
dog meat industry as well as the labor in
this industry, dozens of farmers drove pickup trucks to
wait for dogs locked in cages and
covered with silver on top with the intention of releasing them,
but the police promptly stopped them.
Previously, the presidential government had introduced a
draft law banning the raising and selling of wind meat and
agreed to compensate workers
in the industry for closing business activities
in the next 3 years. Eating wind meat has been a
habit for many generations.  of the
people here, this type of meat is not banned
but also not legalized.
However, the increasing awareness of the public

introduce the above draft.
